name: The Greetings Intelligence
description:
The first official Greetings Cult game!

Play as Chad, a member of the Greetings Cult, and try to escape a prison built by your rivals, the Howdy Co!

Controls: Move with the arrow keys, use Z to interact and next dialogue, and left shift to sprint.

Soundtrack: https://soundcloud.com/dry-music-10118085/sets/the-greetings-intelligence

Nate B (Glyde): https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEnbkclFZ9CJ_vD6cdPGPIw

DryMusic: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRzeAdRCUzPh-d_VjoxC3og

Splash!: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTpUP-TvufrK5-a0Sfmg8Ig
